project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement command-line interface for user input to enter city name
Display fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and output formatting
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
